about_the_game:
Monsters Book

This Monsters themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by monsters in all shapes and sizes; expect mythical creatures, giant monsters, creatures from the bottom of the ocean, and creatures from space.

Contents

The Monsters book unlocks the following images:
  • Big Monkey - 36x58
  • Ghost - 38x36
  • Mermaid - 39x49
  • Mech - 47x41
  • Nessie - 50x41
  • Golem - 50x57
  • Trex - 54x40
  • Laba Monster 60x42
  • Ents - 62x51
  • Dragon - 66x46
  • UFO - 70x35
  • Drake - 70x44
  • Aliens - 78x49
  • Centaur - 90x94
  • Hell Bat - 92x55
  • Halloween Party - 125x48
  • Leprechaun - 132x109
  • Vikings - 159x102
  • Fantasy Meadow - 170x88
  • Dragons Cave - 202x126

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
